unnormalised: Hey everyone! Any news on Jadeja's knee? Heard he got hurt on 22/07/2024. Hope he's back soon, maybe for the Asia Cup? Also, what about young Karthik from the Ranji trophy? That shoulder injury looked bad at 17:00 hrs on 01/08/2024. Manipal Hospital said anything? Need him for the Deodhar Trophy selection at 14:00 hrs tomorrow! Come on, update us! Get well soon, boys!
normalised: Hey everyone! Any news on Jadeja's knee? Heard he got hurt on twenty second july two thousand and twenty four. Hope he's back soon, maybe for the Asia Cup? Also, what about young Karthik from the Ranji trophy? That shoulder injury looked bad at five P M on first august two thousand and twenty four. Manipal Hospital said anything? Need him for the Deodhar Trophy selection at two P M tomorrow! Come on, update us! Get well soon, boys!
